name: multiplier
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a number used to multiply another number. A multiplier is often used to calculate things such as tax or pension payments: If you currently receive a $360 monthly pension and the multiplier goes to 2%, then your pension will increase to $400.
[ S ]
  ECONOMICS spending on one product or service that causes people and organizations to spend on other things as a result: House sales have a multiplier effect on the economy.
